content.html:
I made identical file to "Srcsim/Console.msg" in my package.

When im trying to send data to /srcsim/qual1/light getting this error:

[FATAL] [1484827798.754011791, 40.351000000]: ASSERTION FAILED file = /opt/ros/indigo/include/ros/publisher.h line = 115 cond = impl_->md5sum_ == "" || std::string(mt::md5sum<M>(message)) == "" || impl_->md5sum_ == mt::md5sum<M>(message) message = [FATAL] [1484827798.754060869, 40.351000000]: Trying to publish message of type [beginner_tutorials/to_nasa/0b078dcc7da73ed0ec414a41743aee68] on a publisher with type [std_msgs/String/992ce8a1687cec8c8bd883ec73ca41d1] [FATAL] [1484827798.754070422, 40.351000000]:

The code:

NodeHandle n;

Publisher to_nasa = n.advertise<std_msgs::String>("/srcsim/qual1/light", 1000);

beginner_tutorials::to_nasa msg;

msg.x = 1.000;

msg.y = 0.000;

msg.z = 0.000;

msg.r = 1.000;

msg.g = 0.000;

msg.b = 0.000;

to_nasa.publish(msg);
